reviewText: Love it. Wish the show had more seasons.
Series 2 is even better than Series 1.  Darren Boyd has perfect timing.  Great cast and writing.
A bit of humour where the adolescents are in control, but find they need and want their adults. A third series would be a welcome addition.
This British sit-com is original, hilarious and every character is a "character" in every oddball sense of the word. I highly recommend for anyone who loves crazy, clever and witty.
Just love this series. I think of you like Arrested Development and British humor, you'll enjoy this.
I believe this show is fun and entertaining. I like the characters development and is fun for the whole family. I believe this show is for pure entertainment and fun.

As silly and entertaining as the first series, Spy Series 2 takes us on further journeys with the hapless Darren Boyd as Tim, his precocious son Jude Wright as Marcus, and his strange friend Mathew Baynton (as Chris).

Funny. Funny. Funny! If you love British humor and bumbling idiots you're going to love this comedy. Can't decide which character is my favorite because I love them all. Only complaint is that I finished both series and now I have to wait for season 3.

Loved but want more...but afraid that was the end of a very great spy series!
Sad that!
what a gem - sad its the end of the series
A really good series.  Great Characters.  Just a joy to watch. Wish there were more, Only 2 seasons.
It was a good show, short series.
A very funny and very British series.  I wish there were more.  Every actor had a part in the whole not just filler parts.
So funny!  Quick-paced.  Wish there were more seasons.
